# README #

This project is for Valentino, which should display content by url parameter

### What is this repository for? ###

* For weibo/web
* Wechat with ad
* Wechat without ad (follow)

### How do I get set up? ###
* For frontend, the build tools is gulp, compass
* For gulp, go root directory, run "gulp"
* For optimize the image, run "gulp tinypng" in root directory
* For css, go "/src" folder, run "compass watch"

### Haven't update resource  ###

* Slide video
* Qrcode generated by different url parameter

### Api ###

* Product stock status
* Wechat share
* Wechat follow
